strings.description: A grown-up mini shield pot. They store all the knowledge they have obtained relating to DEF within their pot. It carries around a big shield which it wields flawlessly in defending itself. It is thought that such pots were originally produced by the gods to gather up knowledge relating to the various powers throughout the world. It has a strange disposition, taking enjoyment out of using its shield to defend itself from violent attacks.
strings.summon:
Come on, attack me more...
You'll never break my guard!
